alert.note: Alert for Clark (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:53PM EDT until May 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in central Kentucky... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 253 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harris Ferry and Doylesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Goffs Corner, Rightangle, Vianna, Cotton Branch, Trapp, Log Lick, Mina, Rabbit Town, and Bloomingdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
